name: NBCNews
text:
RT @NBCNightlyNews: Watch @PattersonNBC's report on the California wildfires: https://t.co/Vf1wODdj7w

Nearly a million acres have burned - an area larger than the state of Rhode Island. https://t.co/fT1J9SqVn9

name: NBCNews
text: "Convalescent plasma is not the easiest thing to to procure," said Dr. Todd Rice. "It's not quite like just saying, 'Here's a drug. Take it.'" https://t.co/dyNqcJDZrN

name: NBCNews
text: A Georgia police officer who was seen in a now-viral TikTok video using a stun gun on a Black woman during an arrest has been fired. https://t.co/t6cw0PaR5t

name: NBCNews
text: WATCH: Student newspapers at colleges across the country are calling out school administrators over coronavirus concerns on campus. https://t.co/I8w8ykkHQr - @NBCNightlyNews

name: NBCNews
text: Sgt. Elder Fernandes a 23-year-old Fort Hood soldier who has been missing for 5 days, was recently transferred to a different unit because he was the victim of "abusive sexual contact," U.S. Army officials say. https://t.co/vJ1DIf9hBK

name: NBCNews
text: The fatal shooting of a Trayford Pellerin, a 31-year-old Black man, by police in Lafayette, Louisiana, on Friday night has sparked a probe by the Louisiana State Police Bureau of Investigations. https://t.co/MeFM89lwKQ

name: NBCNews
text: California court orders President Trump to pay $44,100 in fees to Stormy Daniels to pay for her legal battle over her effort to cancel a hush-money deal brokered to keep her quiet about their sexual relationship a decade ago. https://t.co/eaRQuUTinw

name: NBCNews
text: A veteran firefighter in Detroit was found dead on Saturday after he dived into a river to save three young girls from drowning, authorities say. https://t.co/LxvQ2WX5Xj
